title: How to Play Scramball

steps.headline: Find a good ball that looks fun to throw at people.
Find players.
steps.description: Once you've found a "Scramball", gather up all of your friends and family. Around 6 - 50 people would be good.

steps.headline: Give different numbers to each player.
Start the game.
steps.description: Once the numbers are given, start the game by throwing the Scramball way up into the air.

steps.headline: Call out a number.
steps.description: While the ball is in the air, the person who threw the ball needs to call out a random number they just gave to one of their players.

steps.headline: Go for the ball.
steps.description: Once the ball hits the ground, the person whose number has just been called goes for the ball.

steps.headline: Play with the following rules:
steps.description: Kills: Throw the Scramball at a player to get a kill. Headshots count. Getting back in: If the person who killed you just got eliminated, you are back in. Bounces: If the Scramball bounces and hits you, you are not out. Double Touches: If you touch the Scramball off of a bounce or accidentally drop it, it is called a Double Touch (Place the Scramball back on the ground if you just noticed you Double Touched). No walking or running with the Scramball. How to win: The person who eliminates everyone wins. Catching: If you the catch the Scramball in mid-air, you got the person who threw the Scramball out.
